extension_refused_title: You cannot request another extension in this service
extension_refused_sub_heading_1: If you've missed your verification deadline
extension_refused_body_text_1: If your deadline has passed, we cannot give you another extension. You should verify your identity and provide your verification details as soon as possible.
extension_refused_guidance_link_text: Guidance on verifying your identity for Companies House
extension_refused_sub_heading_2: If your verification deadline has not passed
extension_refused_body_text_2: You can request another extension. This time, you'll need to provide supporting evidence.
extension_refused_online_form_link: Submit your request and supporting evidence using this online form
